data.text: @Nekosmom @VCHhealthcare You really should seek mental help.
@Nekosmom @VCHhealthcare List of vax side effects https://t.co/9jF9jU3DN3

@Nekosmom @VCHhealthcare Misinformation? As in Pfizer, the actual manufacturer of a vaccine, is now suggesting not to vaccinate under 12? Or that Sweden has paused Moderna vaccines for those under 30? I'm not even anti-vax, but this isn't as black and white as you've clearly indicated it is.
@Nekosmom @VCHhealthcare It's about risk tolerance, not disinformation. I've read all the same science and I'm still choosing to wait for many of my own personal reasons
@VCHhealthcare @BCGovNews Might be something to do with all the people have severe adverse reactions. Cant wait for the safety data being released tomorrow
@VCHhealthcare Or somebody they know had a severe reaction. Like a heart attack. Or neurological issues. Like people I know. Then they got heavily censored for trying to say anything. Seems normal.
